select * from ( select a.id, a.secu_id as secu_id, a.pub_dt, a.bgn_dt, a.end_dt, a.ntc_cont, a.typ_codei, a.typ_codeii, a.typ_namei, a.typ_nameii, a.ent_time, A.UPD_TIME, a.rs_id, b.trd_code as trd_code, b.secu_sht, b.typ_codei as bsi_typ_codei from bas_spcl_ntc a left join bas_secu_info b on a.secu_id = b.secu_id where b.typ_codei in (10, 12)
union
select a.id, a.secu_id, a.pub_dt, a.bgn_dt, a.end_dt, a.ntc_cont, a.typ_codei, a.typ_codeii, a.typ_namei, a.typ_nameii, a.ent_time, A.UPD_TIME, a.rs_id, substr(b.trd_code, 0, 6) as trd_code, b.secu_sht, b.typ_codei as bsi_typ_codei from bas_spcl_ntc a left join bas_secu_info b on a.secu_id = b.secu_id where b.typ_codei = 11 ) order by upd_time asc

select * from ( select a.id,a.secu_id as secu_id, a.pub_dt, a.bgn_dt, a.end_dt, a.ntc_cont, a.typ_codei, a.typ_codeii, a.typ_namei, a.typ_nameii, a.ent_time, a.UPD_TIME, a.rs_id, b.trd_code as trd_code, b.secu_sht, b.typ_codei as bsi_typ_codei from bas_spcl_ntc a left join bas_secu_info b on a.secu_id = b.secu_id where b.typ_codei in (10, 12)
union
select a.id,a.secu_id, a.pub_dt, a.bgn_dt, a.end_dt, a.ntc_cont, a.typ_codei, a.typ_codeii, a.typ_namei, a.typ_nameii, a.ent_time, a.UPD_TIME,
a.rs_id, substr(b.trd_code, 0, 6) as trd_code, b.secu_sht, b.typ_codei as bsi_typ_codei from bas_spcl_ntc a left join bas_secu_info b on a.secu_id = b.secu_id where b.typ_codei = 11 ) where Upd_Time >= :maxUpDate order by Upd_Time asc
